Source.Name: sl
Source.Summary: SL (Steam Locomotive) runs across your terminal when you type "sl" as you meant to type "ls"
Source.Description: SL (Steam Locomotive) runs across your terminal when you type "sl" as you meant to type "ls". It's just a joke command, and not useful at all.
